qa.name: Tommy
qa.appearance: Small for his age, with glasses

hf.name: Whisper
hf.appearance: Shimmering outline, only visible to Tommy

json_to_edit.voice_over: Sometimes, the best friends are the ones no one else can see.
json_to_edit.description: Tommy's invisible friend Whisper helps him stand up to a bully in the schoolyard.
json_to_edit.name: Invisible Protector
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Tommy's invisible friend Whisper helps him confront a bully and gain confidence.

qa.action: Tommy sits alone on a bench in the bustling playground, looking dejected.

hf.action: Whisper appears next to Tommy, visible only as a shimmering outline.

tr.action: The bully approaches Tommy, looking menacing.

xc.action: Whisper leans in close to Tommy, giving him words of encouragement.

ka.action: Tommy's face shows a mix of fear and determination as he stands up.

fn.sfx_keywords: gasps from other children, wind gust
fn.action: Tommy confronts the bully, with Whisper standing invisibly beside him.

af.action: The bully looks surprised and uncertain, taking a step back.

qo.action: Tommy speaks up, his voice growing stronger with each word.

fp.action: Other children gather around, supporting Tommy and turning away from the bully.

va.action: The teacher approaches, smiling proudly at Tommy as Whisper fades away.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

label.rationale: we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. this means we'll remove shots with keys "tr", "ka", and "qo" from the original 10 shots, leaving us with 7 shots. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field and adjust the "list_display_order" accordingly. the remaining shots and their content will stay the same, maintaining the overall flow of the scene.
